entity.name: physical_quantity_value
entity.description: A physical_quantity_value is a type of general_property and class that is a Physical_quantity_value (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: physical_quantity_symmetry
entity.description: A physical_quantity_symmetry is a type of general_property and class that is a Physical_quantity_symmetry (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: physical_quantity_symmetry_by_library_reference
entity.description: A physical_quantity_symmetry_by_library_reference is a general_property and an externally_defined_item that is a Physical_quantity_symmetry_by_library_reference (as defined in the ARM).

entity.name: space_for_physical_quantity
entity.description: A space_for_physical_quantity is a type of general_property_relationship that is a Space_for_physical_quantity (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_property
explicit.description: the physical_quantity_space that indicates the physical phenomenon.

explicit.name: related_property
explicit.description: the physical_quantity_value that is a member of the space.

entity.name: standard_physical_quantity_symmetry
entity.description: A standard_physical_quantity_symmetry is a type of physical_quantity_symmetry_by_library_reference that is a Standard_physical_quantity_symmetry (as defined in the ARM).

where.label: valid_standard_class
where.description: The supplier shall be 'ISO-TS-10303-1099', and the code shall be one of those listed in Table 1.

entity.name: symmetry_for_physical_quantity
entity.description: A symmetry_for_physical_quantity is a type of general_property_relationship that is a Symmetry_for_physical_quantity (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_property
explicit.description: the physical_quantity_symmetry that indicates the symmetry.

explicit.name: related_property
explicit.description: the physical_quantity_value that has the symmetry.
